abstract: LyondellBasell Industries says it rejected a takeover bid by Reliance Industries because it has a superior reorganization plan that would leave the chemical maker valued at about $15.2 billion.
snippet: LyondellBasell Industries says it rejected a takeover bid by Reliance Industries because it has a superior reorganization plan that would leave the chemical maker valued at about $15.2 billion.
lead_paragraph: LyondellBasell Industries says it rejected a takeover bid by Reliance Industries because it has a superior reorganization plan that would leave the chemical maker valued at about $15.2 billion, Bloomberg News reports.

headline.main: Lyondell Says Its Plan Is Better Than Reliance Bid
